channel.title: Supports on Valt - Making Passwords Painless

item.title: Valt Synchronization
item.description: Valt Synchronization Valt Synchronization works by registering a device through email and then authorizing subsequent devices through trusted sources—phones, tablets and desktops that you have previously authorized. It is important to initiate syncing using the device on which you created your Valt. To enable Valt syncing on your iOS or Mac Desktop, select the Enable backup and syncing option in Valt Preferences. You will be asked for your email address.
